thread.title: Justine Bateman bets those GOP senators who confirmed Michael Flynn must feel pretty stupid
thread.title_full: Justine Bateman bets those GOP senators who confirmed Michael Flynn must feel pretty stupid

author: Brett T.
title: Justine Bateman bets those GOP senators who confirmed Michael Flynn must feel pretty stupid
text:
Justine Bateman bets those GOP senators who confirmed Michael Flynn must feel pretty stupid Posted at 12:33 am on February 14, 2017 by Brett T. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Progressives aren’t enjoying quite the party they did when the 9th Circuit upheld the stay on President Trump’s travel ban, but there’s still an enthusiastic celebration over the resignation of National Security Adviser Michael Flynn . 
Actress Justine Bateman quickly deleted her tweet, but for a few minutes there, she was having a good time ridiculing all of the Republican Senators who had voted to confirm Flynn. 
What a bunch of morons — we’d bet they’d feel pretty stupid right about now if there were any. Who wants to tell her? https://t.co/exLkGPd1c8
